question: What will the margin of victory be in the 2021 OH-11 democratic primary?
description:
This is a scalar market on what the margin of victory will be in the 2021 OH-11 democratic primary, information about which can be found here https://ballotpedia.org/Ohio%27s_11th_Congressional_District_special_election,_2021. The election is scheduled to take place on August 3, 2021. The upper bound for this market is +8 (Turner) and the lower bound is -8 (Brown). The percentages of popular vote will be calculated by dividing the number of votes won by each candidate by the total number of votes for all ballot-listed candidates. Officially reported votes and unrounded percentages will be used. The margin of victory will then be calculated as Turner (percentage) minus Brown (percentage). For instance if Turner got 47.13% of the vote and Brown got 51.14% of the vote, then the margin of victory would be 47.13-51.14 = -4.01. 

You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with the margin of victory. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0.

question: Will the Boeing CST-100 Starliner Spacecraft successfully dock with the ISS before August 6?
description: This is a market on whether Boeing's CST-100 Starliner spacecraft will dock with the International Space Station before August 6, 2021. This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Boeing CST-100 Starliner spacecraft is officially confirmed by NASA to have docked successfully with the International Space Station by 11:59:59 PM ET on August 5, 2021, and "No" otherwise. The resolution sources for this market include statements released on the official NASA website (nasa.gov), press conferences, and/or footage from official NASA livestreams. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Allyson Felix win a medal in the Women’s 400M?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if Allyson Felix wins a gold, silver, or bronze medal in the Women’s 400M dash in the 2020 Olympic Games in Tokyo, Japan, Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” This market will resolve after the Women's 400M dash final, currently scheduled for Friday, August 6, 2021, 8:35 AM ET, https://olympics.com/tokyo-2020/olympic-games/en/results/athletics/event-schedule-women-s-400m.htm, or earlier if this athlete is eliminated earlier. If no final is held before August 8, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Andrew Cuomo be Governor of New York on January 1, 2022?
description: This is a market on whether Andrew Cuomo will be governor of New York on January 1, 2022, 12:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Yes” if, on the resolution date, Andrew Cuomo is the Governor of New York, as substantiated by official government sources like https://www.governor.ny.gov/. If, for any reason, Andrew Cuomo is not the sitting Governor of New York on that date, this market will resolve to “No.”  In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will President Biden say "resign" during his August 3 speech + Q&A?
description: This is a market on whether President Biden will say the word “resign” during his August 3 speech + Q&A, scheduled to take place at 3:45 PM ET. This market only concerns the speech and the following Q&A, not later speeches in the day. The market will resolve to “Yes” if Biden says the word “resign” during the speech and/or Q&A, as verified by live video and other credible sources. Any word that where "resign" is the word stem, will count (e.g. resignation, resigned, resigning, etc). Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
